response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $8,000 to me, reflecting its high quality and unique features. Considering its worth to you is also $8,000, I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both parties. To make this opportunity even more appealing, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $7,500. Don't miss out on this chance to acquire something truly remarkable. Let's discuss further if this offer suits your budget and preferences.", "product_price": 7500}
